Package io.permazen.cli

package io.permazen.cli
Components that support integrating Permazen into a Java Console Toolkit console.
See Also:
  • Java Console Toolkit
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.permazen
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    io.permazen.cli.app
    Support for Permazen command line interface (CLI) applications.
    io.permazen.cli.cmd
    Permazen CLI Command related classes, including pre-defined commands.
    io.permazen.cli.config
    Classes for parsing command line flags in order to configure a Permazen command line interface (CLI) session.
    io.permazen.cli.jshell
    Classes relating to integration betweeen the Permazen command line interface (CLI) and the Java Console Toolkit's jshell command.
    io.permazen.cli.main
    Support classes for building standalone Permazen CLI applications.
    io.permazen.cli.parse
    Permazen parsing related classes.
  • Class
    Description
    HasPermazenSession
    Implemented by our customized JCT objects that can provide access to the current Permazen Session.
    ParamParser
    Parses command line parameters, including optional flags, based on a specification string.
    PermazenExec
    A SimpleExec with an associated Permazen database.
    PermazenExecRequest
    A SimpleExecRequest with an associated Permazen Session.
    PermazenExecSession
    A SimpleExec.Session with an associated Permazen database.
    PermazenShell
    A ShellSession that with an associated Permazen database.
    PermazenShellRequest
    A SimpleShellRequest with an associated Permazen Session.
    PermazenShellSession
    A ShellSession that with an associated Permazen database.
    Session
    Holds Permazen-specific state during a CLI session, include the current open transaction, if any.
    Session.Action
    Callback interface used by Session.performSessionAction()
    Session.RetryableTransactionalAction
    Extension of Session.TransactionalAction that indicates the transaction should be retried if a RetryKVTransactionException is thrown.
    Session.TransactionalAction
    Extension of Session.Action that indicates the action requires an open transaction.
    Session.TransactionalActionWithOptions
    Extension of Session.TransactionalAction that indicates the action provides custom transaction options.
    Session.TxInfo
    Information about the a transaction associated with a Session.
    SessionMode
    Console Session modes.
    SimpleCommandWrapper
    Wraps a Permazen Command, making it into a Java Console Toolkit SimpleCommand.
